articles.title: Denise Richards accuses estranged husband Aaron Phypers of trying to kill her during violent outbursts
articles.description: Denise Richards has been granted a restraining order against her estranged husband, Aaron Phypers, after she accused him of abusing her.
articles.content:
Denise Richards was granted a restraining order against her estranged husband, Aaron Phypers, after accusing him of abuse.
In court documents filed Wednesday, the “Wild Things” actress details several alleged violent altercations she has had with Phy... [3933 chars]
